'(
wordrules

;; DISEASES/ FINDINGS
((ruleid "calcification-1") 
  (concept ":CALCIFICATION:") 
  (words ("calcification" "calcifications" "calcified")))
    
((ruleid "atelectasis-word-rule") 
  (concept ":ATELECTASIS:") 
  (words ("atelectasis" "atelectatic")))
    
((ruleid "atherosclerosis-word-rule") 
  (concept ":ATHEROSCLEROSIS:") 
  (words ("atherosclerotic" "atherosclerosis")))
  
((ruleid "consolidation-word-rule") 
  (concept ":CONSOLIDATION:") 
  (words ("consolidative" "consolidation" "consolidated")))
  
((ruleid "pneumonia-word-rule") 
  (concept ":PNEUMONIA:") 
  (words ("pneumonia" "pneumonias" "pneumonitis")))
  
((ruleid "tortuous-word-rule") 
  (concept ":TORTUOUS:") 
  (words ("tortuous")))
  
((ruleid "blunting-word-rule") 
  (concept ":BLUNTING:") 
  (words ("blunting")))
  
((ruleid "infection-word-rule") 
  (concept ":INFECTION:") 
  (words ("infection" "infections")))
  
((ruleid "effusion-word-rule") 
  (concept ":EFFUSION:") 
  (words ("effusion" "effusions")))
  
((ruleid infiltrate-word-rule) 
  (concept ":INFILTRATE:") 
  (words ("infiltrate" "infiltrates" "infiltrative" "infiltration")))
  
((ruleid opacity-word-rule) 
  (concept ":OPACITY:") 
  (words ("opacity" "opacities")))
  
((ruleid "density-word-rule") 
  (concept ":DENSITY:") 
  (words 
    ("density" "densities")))
    
((ruleid "streaky-word-rule") 
  (concept ":STREAKY:") 
  (words 
    ("streaks" "streaky")))
  
((ruleid "ill-defined-word-rule") 
  (concept ":ILL-DEFINED:")
  (words ("hazy" "vague" "ill defined" "ill-defined" "poorly marginated" "indistinct")))
  
((ruleid "compressive-word-rule") 
  (concept ":COMPRESSIVE:")
  (words ("compressive")))
  
((ruleid "linear-word-rule") 
  (concept ":LINEAR:")
  (words ("linear" "some linear features" "strandy linear")))
  
((ruleid "diffuse-word-rule") 
  (concept ":DIFFUSE:")
  (words ("diffuse")))
  
((ruleid "patchy-word-rule") 
  (concept ":PATCHY:")
  (words ("patchy")))
  
((ruleid "localized-word-rule") 
  (concept ":LOCALIZED:")
  (words ("local" "localized")))
  
((ruleid "metastatic-word-rule") 
  (concept ":METASTATIC:")
  (words ("metastatic")))
  
((ruleid "disease-word-rule") 
  (concept ":DISEASE:")
  (words ("disease")))
  
((ruleid "abnormality-0") 
  (concept ":ABNORMALITY:") 
  (words 
    ("abnormalities" "abnormality")))
    
((ruleid "rounded-shape-word-rule") 
  (concept ":ROUNDED:") 
  (words 
    ("round" "rounded")))
    
;; quantitative modifiers
((ruleid "mild-word-rule") 
  (concept ":MINIMAL:")
  (words ("mild" "minimal")))
  
((ruleid "medium-word-rule") 
  (concept ":MODERATE:")
  (words ("medium" "moderate")))
  
((ruleid "severe-word-rule") 
  (concept ":MAXIMAL:")
  (words ("severe" "maximal")))
  
((ruleid "acute-word-rule") 
  (concept ":ACUTE:")
  (words ("acute")))
  
((ruleid "chronic-word-rule") 
  (concept ":CHRONIC:")
  (words ("chronic" "persists")))
  
((ruleid "active-word-rule") 
  (concept ":ACTIVE:")
  (words ("active")))
  
((ruleid dense-word-rule)
 (concept ":DENSE:")
 (words ("dense")))
 



)
